price: 30. Yallih farmoyti Mucammad isi Rabbil weqsitak Yi- Rabbow diggah yi-mari Qhureyshi A-Qhuraan cabeeh cabeynah kaa haysiteeh kaak yexxeereenih iyye.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-rasūlu yārabbi inna qawmī ittakhadhū hādhā al-qur'āna mahjūran
